sentences.en: a reported sighting of the Loch Ness monster
sentences.cn: 据报道有人看见尼斯湖水怪

sentences.en: AnotIT attraction ITe is a legendary monster : the Loch Ness Monster.
sentences.cn: 那里游人如织的另唯一理由则是尼斯湖的怪兽.

sentences.en: Die Blende ist nichts anderes , als ein in seinem Durchmesser variables Loch.
sentences.cn: 快门并不是什么特别的东西, 它只是可以调节宽度的缝隙.

sentences.en: Do you believe in the Loch Ness monster?
sentences.cn: 你相信内斯湖有水怪 吗 ?

sentences.en: Even the Loch Ness Monster makes the list at number 56.
sentences.cn: 甚至连尼斯湖水怪也榜上有名,排行第56位.

sentences.en: Hugh Gray takes the first known photos of the Loch Ness Monster.
sentences.cn: 1933年的今天,休·格雷拍摄了已知的唯一一张“尼斯湖水怪”的照片.

sentences.en: In the mouth of Loch Aline we found a great seagoing ship at anchor.
sentences.cn: 在亚林湾的出口处,我们发现那儿停泊了一艘出海的大船.

sentences.en: Loch plainly felt guilty about it.
sentences.cn: 洛赫明显对此感到愧疚。

sentences.en: Loch turned his head towards the direction of the sound.
sentences.cn: 卢克转动着头,寻找着声音的来源.

sentences.en: The loch's overflow cascades into the waterfalls of a Japanese water garden.
sentences.cn: 溢出的湖水倾泻而下，形成了一座日式水景花园的瀑布。

sentences.en: The sides of the loch are almost perpendicular.
The Story of the Loch Ness Monster has attracted many tourists to the area.
sentences.cn: 尼斯湖怪兽的传说吸引了很多游客来到这个地区.

sentences.en: There have been many attempts to track down the putative Loch Ness monster.
sentences.cn: 人们为追踪假定存在的尼斯湖水怪做了许多努力。

sentences.en: There have been many attempts, both light-hearted and serious, to locate the Loch Ness Monster.
sentences.cn: 有很多人或随意或认真地尝试过，想要找到尼斯湖水怪。

sentences.en: They spent their afternoons playing golf—extremely badly, I may add—around Loch Lomond.
sentences.cn: 他们下午都在洛蒙德湖边打高尔夫——顺便提一句，球技糟透了。

phrases.tran_cn: 尼斯湖水怪（相传在尼斯湖出现的一种巨型怪兽）

trans.tran_en: a lake or a part of the sea partly enclosed by land in Scotland
